title: Change my name because I think it may be considered racist?
body:
Greetings summoners!

I am not new to the rift as this is my smurf account but I would like to know if my account name can be reset so I can change it. I made this account a while ago and I think that it may be racist. I don't want to spend money to change it as I am fairly poor. So I would like to know if a  riot employee could help me out and change it for me.

Also, the reason I'm doing this is because I'm afraid that the account may be suspended or banned from reports. I feel like some may report me for this name and I will have a punishment. 

Thanks for reading and considering.

Cheers!

replies.body: Yeeeaaaa I feel like this name is pretty borderline, if not over the line already. Next time you login you'll be prompted to change it.

Ok thanks so much!!!




I'm also sorry for wasting your time and being toxic to the community, I'm not sure why I created this account with this vile name but thanks again.
